All Implemented Interfaces:
net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.java.ast.JavaParserVisitor, net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.rule.ImmutableLanguage, net.sourceforge.pmd.PropertySource, net.sourceforge.pmd.Rule
Direct Known Subclasses:
PageImportRestriction, TestCaseImportRestriction, UIMapImportRestriction
public class ImportRestrictions
extends AbstractAludraTestRule

Configurable and extensible rule for restricting imports. When not subclassing this class, it will check the imports in ALL classes under test. Subclasses override the implemented visit() method to first check the class if the imports shall be checked, and only if conditions are met, invoke the super visit() method.

Author:
falbrech

Field Detail

ALLOWED_IMPORT_PREFIXES_DESCRIPTOR

public static final net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.rule.properties.StringProperty ALLOWED_IMPORT_PREFIXES_DESCRIPTOR
Property descriptor for the configuration property which import prefixes to allow. This is a comma-separated list of prefixes to allow. Please note that e.g. "java.util." would match not only all java.util.* classes, but also all java.util.regex.* classes! Note also that you must not include the asterisk (*) in the prefix value here, because it is a string-based prefix, not a package name.

ANNOTATIONS_ALLOWED_DESCRIPTOR

public static final net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.rule.properties.BooleanProperty ANNOTATIONS_ALLOWED_DESCRIPTOR
Property descriptor for the configuration property if imports of annotation classes should generally be ignored. If set to true, all kinds of annotation classes are allowed to be imported, otherwise, they would have to be enabled using the other configuration properties of this rule, or would raise a rule violation.

UTIL_CLASSES_ALLOWED_DESCRIPTOR

public static final net.sourceforge.pmd.lang.rule.properties.BooleanProperty UTIL_CLASSES_ALLOWED_DESCRIPTOR
Property descriptor for the configuration property if imports of utility classes should generally be ignored.
A utility class is defined as a class with all public methods being static and no public constructor available.
If set to true, all kinds of utility classes are allowed to be imported, otherwise, they would have to be enabled using the other configuration properties of this rule, or would raise a rule violation.
